Chicken and Dressing Casserole

Ingredients

  • 2 1/2 chicken breasts
  • 1 1/2 cups Pepperidge Farm stuffing mix
  • 1/2 stick butter
  • 1 can cream of chicken soup
  • 3/4 cup broth
  • 3/4 cup milk

Instructions

  1. Combine all ingredients and bake for 1 hour at 350F
